properties.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 11 at 5:06AM ChST until February 15 at 6:00AM ChST by NWS Tiyan GU
properties.description:
...NORTHWEST TO NORTHEAST SWELL TO PRODUCE HAZARDOUS SURF ACROSS
THE MARIANAS...

...NORTHWEST SWELL WILL COMBINE WITH BUILDING NORTHEAST SWELL TO
PRODUCE HAZARDOUS SURF ALONG NORTH FACING REEFS THE NEXT FEW DAYS...

* ALONG NORTH FACING REEFS...HAZARDOUS SURF OF 6 TO 9 FEET THIS
MORNING WILL BUILD TO BETWEEN 8 AND 10 FEET WEDNESDAY. THE HIGH
RISK OF RIP CURRENTS WILL CONTINUE THROUGH FRIDAY.

* ALONG EAST FACING REEFS...THE RIP CURRENT RISK WILL REMAIN HIGH
THE NEXT SEVERAL DAYS DUE TO A BROAD AREA OF NORTHEAST TO EAST
WINDS UPSTREAM OF THE MARIANAS.
properties.instruction:
DO NOT VENTURE NEAR REEF LINES ALONG NORTH AND EAST FACING REEFS.
IF YOU BECOME CAUGHT IN A RIP CURRENT...REMAIN CALM. STAY AFLOAT
WHILE WAITING FOR HELP. IF YOU HAVE TO SWIM OUT OF A RIP
CURRENT...SWIM PARALLEL TO SHORE...THEN BACK TOWARD THE BEACH WHEN
POSSIBLE. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO SWIM DIRECTLY AGAINST A RIP CURRENT
AS YOU WILL TIRE QUICKLY.

NWSheadline: HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH FRIDAY... ...HIGH RISK OF RIP CURRENTS ALONG NORTH AND EAST FACING REEFS
